name: Luminesse Sterling Silver Faux White Pearl Necklace made with Swarovski Elements, 18.75"

reviews.name: Luminesse Sterling Silver Faux White Pearl Necklace made with Swarovski Elements, 18.75"
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift from my husband and I to our daughter at her shower as that Special gift from us for her wedding day. It brought tears to her eyes and it was something she was looking for that she couldn't find. Now she can pass it down to her daughter....
reviews.title: Beautiful necklace!

reviews.name: Luminesse Sterling Silver Faux White Pearl Necklace made with Swarovski Elements, 18.75"
reviews.reviewText: I found this at my local Walmart store. I had to have it for my wedding! It was just what I was looking for. The only thing I would say is, it's a bit expensive for what it is. I know it has some sterling silver on it but the "pearls" aren't real, I wish they were cultured pearls at least. However, it's a beautiful necklace and I'm very happy I found it.
reviews.title: Beautiful necklace

reviews.name: Luminesse Sterling Silver Faux White Pearl Necklace made with Swarovski Elements, 18.75"
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for our daughter for her wedding day. The chevron angled design, the choker length and drop pearl is perfect for the sweetheart neckline on her gown. She is in love with it. My only critique is the round pearls look faux. But overall the quality is very good. It is sterling and has Swarovski crystals which we love.
reviews.title: Perfect for a bride
